lines.text:
[seeing the first murder victim, a guy dressed in full hockey outfit]
Boy, hockey is a tough sport!
[Kennedi is held captive on a talk show's set]
And our other guest is a current hostage. We're not going to reveal her name to you right now; we'll wait to see if you can guess who she is by the end of the program.
[to Kennedi, who is about to be eaten by the killer tomatoes]
Your research grant has just been permanently cancelled.
